content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron gear wheel crafting setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x2) for smelting iron plates
- Assembling machine (position z1) for crafting iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts iron plates into the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to craft without required ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plates, which must be available either in your inventory or produced in a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
